https://tmrev.io/movie/29150-Big Fan 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/w29ex7m662TUot6fVsgDHoyTZaK.jpg Paul Aufiero, a 35-year-old parking-garage attendant from Staten Island, is the self-described "world's biggest New York Giants fan". One night, Paul and his best friend Sal spot Giants star linebacker Quantrell Bishop at a gas station and decide to follow him. At a strip club Paul cautiously decides to approach him but the chance encounter brings Paul's world crashing down around him. Big Fan
